abstract: Stephen A. Schwarzman’s move to contribute $100 million to start a scholarship program in China may not be entirely philanthropic, but there will still be many beneficiaries if it helps Western and Chinese elites understand each other better.
snippet: Stephen A. Schwarzman’s move to contribute $100 million to start a scholarship program in China may not be entirely philanthropic, but there will still be many beneficiaries if it helps Western and Chinese elites understand each other better.
lead_paragraph: The Blackstone Group founder Stephen A. Schwarzman is giving something back – to China.

abstract: The government’s response to a deadly earthquake is yet another test of its ability to deliver the goods. The administration of President Xi Jinping takes more steps to tackle corruption.
snippet: The government’s response to a deadly earthquake is yet another test of its ability to deliver the goods. The administration of President Xi Jinping takes more steps to tackle corruption.
lead_paragraph: The challenges continue for China’s new leadership.

headline.main: Earthquake Response and Political Tensions Return to the Spotlight
